alert.note: Alert for Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 7:42PM MST until July 23 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MST FOR NORTHEASTERN PIMA COUNTY... At 742 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, or 12 miles southwest of Tucson, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Sahuarita, Drexel Heights, Three Points, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Valencia West, Tucson Estates, Saguaro National Park West, Summit, San Xavier Mission and Ryan AirField. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
